content:
/>
XIV.3.2.d
.
Handling Cases of Fraud
If there is an indication that someone is or was fraudulently receiving the benefits of a deceased beneficiary, follow the procedures in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 3.A
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 3 - Routine Review of Running Awards to 100-Year-Old Beneficiaries
